title: Multilingual Learner Support: Science Instructional Design Simulation Training

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary Science Subject Matter Knowledge and Fundamental Instructional Design Principles
context.additional_context: A simulation-based training environment aimed at applying language standards and assessment frameworks for multilingual learners

learning_goals: Learners can design and implement at least three language-integrated instructional strategies supporting multilingual learners' science concept comprehension
Learners can apply and revise science subject assessment tools based on the WIDA framework at least twice in VR environments
Learners can develop at least five items for formative assessment checklists considering multilingual learners' language proficiency levels

resources: Multilingual Learner Language Assessment Sample Set

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
